bug.author: miguelgfierro
bug.summary: [BUG] Error in test deep dive bidaf q&a due to config file
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
We are using a config file to define the parameters: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/nlp/blob/staging/examples/question_answering/bidaf_config.json>https://github.com/microsoft/nlp/blob/staging/examples/question_answering/bidaf_config.json</denchmark-link>
In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/nlp/blob/staging/examples/question_answering/bidaf_aml_deep_dive.ipynb>the notebook</denchmark-link> one of the parameters is that is used in the tests to reduce the computation time, this parameter is never used because it is shadowed in the config file. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
We need to either remove or limit the config file and being able of adding parameters programmatically <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: closing this since there is a workaround below
